title: The mock-tempest, or, The enchanted castle acted at the Theatre Royal / written by T. Duffett.
author: Duffett, Thomas.
notes: A burlesque of Shadwell's opera, The tempest, which was based on D'Avenant's and Dryden's adaptation of Shakespeare.
The 2nd impression. Cf. Montague Summers reprint in Shakespeare adaptations, 1922, p. xiii-xiv.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
